Instruction: Add the initial seven ingredients to the bread machine according to the manufacturer's instructions. Choose the dough cycle.
Shape the dough into rounds and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Let the dough rise until doubled in size in a warm place.
Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Whisk together 1 egg white and water, then brush the mixture onto the top of the loaf.
Bake until the top of the loaf is golden and the bottom sound hollow when tapped, around 20 minutes.
